              Chocoholic <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/SocialMedia?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SocialMedia</b></a> consultant &amp; strategist, Managing Editor of <a href="http://t.co/hAiIfS2ATj" rel="nofollow" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://CopywriterJournalist.com" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://CopywriterJournalist.com"><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">CopywriterJournalist.com</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible">&nbsp;</span></span></a> - a leading <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/tech?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>tech</b></a> <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/influencer?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>influencer</b></a> in the Middle East <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/AbuDhabi?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>AbuDhabi</b></a> <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/UAE?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UAE</b></a>

    </div>
  </div>
